name: irm_with_full_row
description: IRM insert mode inserting at col 0 shifts existing content right, rightmost chars pushed off edge
comment: CSI 4 h (IRM on), print ABC at cols 0-2, CUP home, insert X at col 0 (shifts ABC right -> XABC), insert Y at col 1 (shifts ABC right -> XYABC, C at col 4); cursor at (0,2)
